text: David Michael Schramm (August 14, 1946 â€“ March 28, 2020) was an American actor. He was best known for playing the role of Roy Biggins in the TV series Wings. He was born in Louisville, Kentucky. Schramm appeared in the television movie, The Dreamer of Oz: The L. Frank Baum Story (1990), and the miniseries, Kennedy (1983), where he played Secretary of Defense Robert McNamara. Schramm played Vic Dumask in Johnny Handsome (1989). Schramm died in New York City from a heart attack on March 28, 2020, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Louisville, Kentucky
title: David Schramm (actor)
